availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Kendall Brown (Meade County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Meade County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Neafus Brown in Meade County, Kentucky, on July 22, 1833. Father of George Brown, Susan Brown, John Brown, Adeline Brown, Singleton Brown, Benjamin Brown, Sarah Brown, Mary Brown, and Henry Brown. Farmer in Meade County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Meade County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, Kentucky, p. 202B.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Meade County Marriages, Film 000390311, p. .
